ComicInfo.Summary:
Things heat up as Ember hires the Lookers to find out who hacked a delicate video from her. But Tanya and Michelle find it has turned into something much deeper they stumble into one cover-up over the next. From webcam girls to super spies, this will be a crazy ride from writer Pat Shand and artist Gabriel Andrade! But this ongoing series gets better - each issue has an Ember solo story as well, written and drawn by Christian Zanier! Available with these sexy covers: Regular, Red Hot, Dancers, Dancers Bikini, and Wraparound by Christian Zanier, Workout and GGA Homage by Renato Camilo, Sexy Spies by Raulo Caceres, and Luscious by Matt Martin.
For the erotic cover art collectors we offer: Nude, Adult, Red Hot Nude, Dancers Topless, Dancers Nude, Dancers Adult, Dancers Adult Extreme , Wraparound Nude, Threesome Adult, Threesome Adult Extreme by Christian Zanier, Workout Nude and GGA Homage Nude by Renato Camilo, Sexy Spies Nude by Raulo Caceres, and Luscious Nude, Luscious Adult by Matt Martin.
